1.accInfo: 24 inch Monitor, IPS Panel, 1080p [FHD], 75Hz refresh rate and 1ms response time. Great to use as extra Monitor

2.accInfo: 32 inch Monitor, IPS Panel, 4K, 144Hz refresh rate and 1ms response time. Great to use as main monitor, especially for writing code

3.accInfo: 80% Mechanical keyboard with no RGB, Includes extra keycaps, Black and white theme.

4.accInfo: capture card with HDMI in and out. Capable of recording at 4K 60fps, fits in PCIex4 and above.

5.accInfo: A Remote key to start your computer remotely using bluetooth. Can be used on wall mounted or hard to reach PCs. Or just for the flex. Fits in PCIex4 slot and above
